title: DEAR RIOT This may be my dying wish. Please consider giving Fiora her blade Waltz back...
body:
I remember when playing Fiora was fun...

Nobody fears me anymore. 

You really hurt the best Fiora pretty bad with that. 

It upset me. 

She's my favorite. 

I still haven't gotten over it and now I may be dying. 

I think one of the best things I could do for the community as my last wish would be to give Fiora her Blade Waltz and her Lunge back as a twin sister champ. As if they've been playing the part of their twin sister. 

Since she is basically a different champ. 

It's a creative idea that only adds to the game. 

I don't think you can refuse.

replies.body: i am sorry to hear of your condition. but if riot caved in to near death pleas, zed teemo and yasuo would have been deleted already

I remember riot saying something along the lines of her old ult was potent that they turned it into her whole kit, basically her whole kit is a taken apart blade waltz that is supposed to be like the original when synced together.
